title: Sunnah Prayer at Home in Congregation
transcript: okay uh aam's second question was what is the ruling on praying my voluntary prayers home but in congregation and the answer is this is permissible the prophet Alat wasam the companions used to pray with him uh F prayer in the Masjid and when mu jabal used to go to his people he used to pray for them but he was praying for ra voluntary so this is permissible for you to go back home and pray with your wife for example or with your uh uh mother and she prays and you pray voluntary prayer uh um
